title: Independence National Historical Park: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer            Volunteer       Volunteers help to connect visitors with the many stories of Independence National Historical Park as well as helping to preserve our heritage. You can help Independence Park in a variety of ways. To apply, select one of the positions listed below and complete the on-line application. Potential volunteers are required to attend an orientation meeting, which occur monthly, before starting on duty. For the orientation schedule or more information about Independence National Historical Park's volunteer program, email the park volunteer coordinator.   Â     Current Volunteer Opportunities
